snippet: The September issue of Bird Talk is the last to appear in print, leaving disappointed subscribers only with BirdChannel.com as the way to read the publication's information on all types of birds.
abstract: The September issue of Bird Talk is the last to appear in print, leaving disappointed subscribers only with BirdChannel.com as the way to read the publication's information on all types of birds.

headline.main: A Bird Magazine's Final Chirps in Print
headline.print_headline: A Bird Magazine’s Final Chirps in Print
